level.heading: Reporting requirements.
level.text: Beginning January 2, 2015, the grant-managing entity shall submit an annual report to the Mayor and the Council of all District funds allocated, which includes:
Performance measures and performance outcomes under each subgrant;
The specific services provided under each subgrant;
The entity providing the services, if one other than the subgrantee;
The time period of delivery of the services;
The actual amount paid for the services; and
The amount of other expenditures under the subgrant, if any.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 1015 of the Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-130, July 30, 2013, 60 DCR 11384, 20 DCSTAT 1827).

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-61: Section 11001 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that, except as otherwise provided, the act shall apply as of October 1, 2013.
